inputs.description: input matrix containing a column ottid
inputs.name: table

name: Return the OpenTree subtree from a node list

outputs.description: quick preview read out of the tree as a newick string
outputs.name: treeNewickString

script:
import requests
import json

rows = table['rows']
idList = []
for i in range(len(rows)):
    idList.append(rows[i]['ottId'])

# lookup the tree that contains these nodes
#payload = {"ottIds": idList}
#resp = requests.post('http://api.opentreeoflife.org/treemachine/v1/getDraftTreeSubtreeForNodes',data=payload)
#tree = str(resp.json()["subtree"])

outstring = ''
# moving to API v3, same syntax as v2
payload = json.dumps({"ott_ids": idList})
outstring = outstring+'payload:'+payload
resp = requests.post('https://api.opentreeoflife.org/v3/tree_of_life/induced_subtree',data=payload)
outstring = outstring+'\nresponse:'+resp.text

try:
    tree = str(resp.json()["newick"])
except:
    outstring = outstring+'\nerror: OpenTree did not return a resulting newick tree'
    tree = '(B,(A,C,E),D);'
    
# tree as a string to preview 
treeNewickString = tree
